name: 1 hour panic
description:
I'll be honest there's nothing good about this game, made in less than an hour. I used some assets from pop! horror city, and the stills were done by preposterous-panda. There was supposed to be this epic boss fight at the end, but I ran out of time. Turns out an hour isn't much time. Enjoy?

There's three endings, prettymuch one ending if you go out, one if you stay home, and another one if you use your computer. That's pretty much it.
